mapper.select: select t.SUBJECT_ID as id, t.NAME as name FROM T_SUBJECT t where t.subject_type=(select c.teach_grade from t_cert_type c where c.ct_id = #{certTypeId} ) and ( t.exam_type=2 or t.exam_type=0 ) and (t.limit_type=0 or t.limit_type=3) and ( t.province=#{province} or t.province is null) and t.status=1 and ( t.parent_id is null ) order by t.subject_code

select s.SUBJECT_ID as id, s.NAME as name FROM T_SUBJECT s where s.parent_id=#{parent} and (s.limit_type=0 or s.limit_type=3 ) and (s.exam_type=2 or s.exam_type=0 ) and (s.province is null or s.province=#{province} ) and s.status=1 order by s.subject_code

select s.SUBJECT_ID as id, s.NAME as name FROM T_SUBJECT s where s.subject_type=(select ct.teach_grade from T_CERT_TYPE ct where ct.ct_id=#{certTypeId}) and s.status=1 and ( s.parent_id is null ) order by s.subject_code
select s.SUBJECT_ID as id, s.NAME as name from T_SUBJECT s where s.parent_id= #{parent} and s.status=1 order by s.subject_code

select s.SUBJECT_ID as id, s.NAME as name from t_subject s where s.subject_type=#{subjectType} and (s.exam_type=2 or s.exam_type=0) and (s.limit_type=0 or s.limit_type=3) and (s.province=#{province} or s.province is null) and s.status=1 and s.parent_id is null order by s.subject_code
